skills.react: I often use next technologies: React-redux for state managing, React-router-dom for interaction with routs, Redux-thunk for side-effects.
skills.ts: I prefer statically typed languages because there is much more time for coding than for fixing bugs.
skills.sass: I use semantic HTML tags. I use normalize.css for cross-browser compatibility and I check the browser support for the tags used (Hello IE!...)
skills.gsap: I prefer greensock (GSAP) library for animation. Today I make easy animation, but I am improving my skill.
skills.rest: I use Axios library for client-server interaction and I am learning Socket.io for web-sockets.

mavik.title: Mavik Pro Landing
mavik.text_1: What tools were used: HTML / SASS, JavaScript, Slick-slider, GSAP for animation, PHPMailer.
mavik.text_2: This is a landing page with a light animation on the greensock (GSAP) library.

ca.title: ChipAssist marketplace
ca.text_1: What tools were used: React / Redux, React-router-dom, Material ui, Styled component, I18next, React Hook Form, Axios, Stripe
ca.text_2: Marketplace for electronic components. Here users search products in a search line or in a catalog and make an order, also they can request missing components.

requests.title: Exchange for sellers
requests.text_1: What tools were used: React / Redux, React-router-dom, Material ui, I18next, Axios
requests.text_2: This is an exchange for sellers, here sellers see requests and respond to them with the best price.
